meanings.definition: In the direction of the equator.
meanings.sent1: The birds flew equatorward to escape the cold winter.
meanings.sent2: The ship sailed equatorward to reach warmer waters.
meanings.sent3: The penguins waddled equatorward, dreaming of sunny beaches.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed equatorward, carrying memories of distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The sun always sets equatorward, painting the sky in vibrant colors.
